alert.note: Alert for Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 5:51PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorm swill impact portions of eastern Pueblo County through 615 PM MDT... At 549 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms just east of Pueblo and, extending into eastern Pueblo county. The storms were moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Avondale around 555 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Boone. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet
